verses.verse: The word<WH1697> of Samuel<WH8050> came to all Israel.<WH3478> Now Israel<WH3478> went out<WH3318> against<WH7125> the Philistines<WH6430> to battle,<WH4421> and encamped<WH2583> beside Ebenezer:<WH72> and the Philistines<WH6430> encamped<WH2583> in Aphek.<WH663>

The Philistines<WH6430> put themselves in array<WH6186> against<WH7125> Israel:<WH3478> and when they joined<WH5203> battle,<WH4421> Israel<WH3478> was struck<WH5062> before<WH6440> the Philistines;<WH6430> and they killed<WH5221> of the army<WH4634> in the field<WH7704> about four<WH702> thousand<WH505> men.<WH376>

When the people<WH5971> had come<WH935> into the camp,<WH4264> the elders<WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> said,<WH559> "Why has Yahweh<WH3068> struck<WH5062> us today<WH3117> before<WH6440> the Philistines?<WH6430> Let us get<WH3947> the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh<WH3068> out of Shiloh<WH7887> to us,<WH935> that it may come among<WH7130> us,<WH3467> and save us out of the hand<WH3709> of our enemies.<WH341>"

So the people<WH5971> sent<WH7971> to Shiloh;<WH7887> and they brought<WH5375> from there the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies,<WH6635> who sits<WH3427> above the cherubim:<WH3742> and the two<WH8147> sons<WH1121> of Eli,<WH5941> Hophni<WH2652> and Phinehas,<WH6372> were there with the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of God.<WH430>

When the ark<WH727> of the covenant<WH1285> of Yahweh<WH3068> came<WH935> into the camp,<WH4264> all Israel<WH3478> shouted<WH7321> with a great<WH1419> shout,<WH8643> so that the earth<WH776> rang again.<WH1949>

When the Philistines<WH6430> heard<WH8085> the noise<WH6963> of the shout,<WH8643> they said,<WH559> "What does the noise<WH6963> of this great<WH1419> shout<WH8643> in the camp<WH4264> of the Hebrews<WH5680> mean?<WH3045>" They understood that the ark<WH727> of Yahweh<WH3068> had come<WH935> into the camp.<WH4264>

The Philistines<WH6430> were afraid,<WH3372> for they said,<WH559> "God<WH430> has come<WH935> into the camp.<WH4264>" They said,<WH559> "Woe<WH188> to us!<WH865> For there has not been such a thing before.

Woe<WH188> to us!<WH5337> Who shall deliver us out of the hand<WH3027> of these mighty<WH117> gods?<WH430> These are the gods<WH430> that struck<WH5221> the Egyptians<WH4714> with all kinds of plagues<WH4347> in the wilderness.<WH4057>

Be strong,<WH2388> and behave<WH1961> like men,<WH582> O you Philistines,<WH6430> that you not be servants<WH5647> to the Hebrews,<WH5680> as they have been<WH5647> to you.<WH1961> Strengthen yourselves like men,<WH582> and fight!<WH3898>"

The Philistines<WH6430> fought,<WH3898> and Israel<WH3478> was struck,<WH5062> and they fled<WH5127> every man<WH376> to his tent:<WH168> and there was a very<WH3966> great<WH1419> slaughter;<WH4347> for there fell<WH5307> of Israel<WH3478> thirty<WH7970> thousand<WH505> footmen.<WH7273>
The ark<WH727> of God<WH430> was taken;<WH3947> and the two<WH8147> sons<WH1121> of Eli,<WH5941> Hophni<WH2652> and Phinehas,<WH6372> were slain.<WH4191>

There ran<WH7323> a man<WH376> of Benjamin<WH1144> out of the army,<WH4634> and came<WH935> to Shiloh<WH7887> the same day,<WH3117> with his clothes<WH4055> torn,<WH7167> and with earth<WH127> on his head.<WH7218>

When he came,<WH935> behold,<WH5941> Eli was sitting<WH3427> on his seat<WH3678> by the road<WH3027> watching;<WH6822> for his heart<WH3820> trembled<WH2730> for the ark<WH727> of God.<WH430> When the man<WH376> came<WH935> into the city,<WH5892> and told<WH5046> it,<WH5892> all the city cried out.<WH2199>

When Eli<WH5941> heard<WH8085> the noise<WH6963> of the crying,<WH6818> he said,<WH559> "What does the noise<WH6963> of this tumult<WH6963> mean?<WH376>" The man hurried,<WH4116> and came<WH935> and told<WH5046> Eli.<WH5941>
Now Eli<WH5941> was ninety<WH8673> - eight<WH8083> years<WH8141> old;<WH1121> and his eyes<WH5869> were set,<WH6965> so that he could<WH3201> not see.<WH7200>

The man<WH376> said<WH559> to Eli,<WH5941> "I am he who came<WH935> out of the army,<WH4634> and I fled<WH5127> today<WH3117> out of the army.<WH4634>" He said,<WH559> "How did the matter<WH1697> go,<WH1121> my son?"

He<WH1319> who brought the news answered,<WH6030> "Israel<WH3478> has fled<WH5127> before<WH6440> the Philistines,<WH6430> and there has been also a great<WH1419> slaughter<WH4046> among the people.<WH5971> Your two<WH8147> sons<WH1121> also,<WH2652> Hophni and Phinehas,<WH6372> are dead,<WH4191> and the ark<WH727> of God<WH430> has been captured.<WH3947>"

It happened,<WH2142> when he made mention of the ark<WH727> of God,<WH430> that Eli fell<WH5307> from off his seat<WH3678> backward<WH322> by<WH1157> the side<WH3027> of the gate;<WH8179> and his neck<WH4665> broke,<WH7665> and he died;<WH4191> for he was an old<WH2204> man,<WH376> and heavy.<WH3513> He had judged<WH8199> Israel<WH3478> forty<WH705> years.<WH8141>

His daughter-in<WH3618>-law, Phinehas<WH6372>' wife,<WH802> was with child,<WH2030> near to be delivered.<WH3205> When she heard<WH8085> the news<WH8052> that<WH413> the ark<WH727> of God<WH430> was taken,<WH3947> and that her father-in<WH2524>-law and her husband<WH376> were dead,<WH4191> she bowed<WH3766> herself and gave birth;<WH3205> for her pains<WH6735> came on her.<WH2015>

About the time<WH6256> of her death<WH4191> the women who stood<WH5324> by her said<WH1696> to her,<WH3372> "Don't be afraid; for you have given birth<WH3205> to a son.<WH1121>" But she didn't<WH6030> answer, neither did she regard it.<WH7896>

She named<WH7121> the child<WH5288> Ichabod,<WH350> saying,<WH559> "The glory<WH3519> has departed<WH1540> from Israel;<WH3478>" because<WH413> the ark<WH727> of God<WH430> was taken,<WH3947> and because of her father-in<WH2524>-law and her husband.<WH376>
She said,<WH559> "The glory<WH3519> has departed<WH1540> from Israel;<WH3478> for the ark<WH727> of God<WH430> is taken.<WH3947>"
